name: Not a Number
description:
Not A Number is a prototype of a boss rush-style game
so far you can fight and kill 1 simple boss with different powers. you can switch powers in order to attack, defend and run fast.

key bindings:
WASD to move
spacebar: activate current power
right/left click: switch powers

softwares used: Unreal Engine 4, Blender, 3D Coat, Adobe Illustrator

Credits

Guillaume Bolis - Design Lead and 3D art

Kieran Jones - 2D concept art

Julia Werner  - programmer
